item.description:
How absolutely, positively, wonderful to have a bunch of fantastic men join our group. Emad, there were 3 men there last night, you will no longer be token any more (but you were missed).

Katie made a wonderful addition to our usual women that showed up in the winter carnival weather. There were at least 10 of us, which was wonderful, wonderful to have you ALL :)
Bette, even tho we didn't play, thank you so much for being there for me (as always)...

AND, I didn't get skunked last night - thank you ALL so very much for that ! ! Even tho Sue and I beat the boards with two of the new people - shame on you Sue :) I deserve it, of course.....

Hope to see Y'ALL February 17 - day after President's Day off :)
item.how_to_find_us: We will be in the back room with our Cribbage Boards Out
item.name: Walthan Cribbage "Past President's Eve" Meet Up
